Articles.Content: It's been a long time since I've played KSP and i'm just now getting back into it. I see that DROMOMAN arms have not been updated.... which leads me to my question... What are the best robotic arms available to use with Infernal Robotics?
I don't know of any current arms - sirkut is currently working on something interesting though http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97269-WIP-Infernal-Robotics-Robotic-Arms
